PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-08701997-07-030,  ,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP
PrecisRe-appointment of JAMES C. SIMEON, of Mississauga, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years and six months, effective August 31, 1997.
